sentence.Network_en: Michael served some anisette to the Don and scotch to Tom Hagen.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克尔给老头子斟了些茵香酒,给汤姆-黑根斟了些苏格兰威士忌.

sentence.Network_en: Michael served some anisette and scotch to Tom Hagen.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克尔给老头子斟了些茵香酒,给汤姆-黑根斟了些苏格兰威士忌.

sentence.Network_en: Yes, an Anisette for my friend and a Brandy for myself.
sentence.Network_cn: 好的, 请给我朋友一杯茴香甜酒,给我一杯白兰地.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 茴香酒(Anisette)，是一种法国产的八角香料酒，酒度为25%—30%。杏仁白兰地(AphcotBrandy)，用杏和杏的果仁制成，酒度为30%…
1、茴香利口酒（anisette）（Anisette）　　是以“茴香”为基础的利口酒并且在大多数地中海国家中深受欢迎。因此，每个地区都有当地自己版本的“ …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, diminutive of anis (see anise)

means.word_mean: 1. liquorice-flavored usually colorless sweet liqueur made from aniseed
